Math Functions
PHP Manual

cos

(PHP 4, PHP 5)

cos — Cosine

Description

float cos ( float $arg )

cos() returns the cosine of the arg parameter. The arg parameter is in radians.

Parameters

arg

An angle in radians

Return Values

The cosine of arg

Examples

Example #1 cos() example

<?php

echo cos(M_PI); // -1

?>

See Also

  • acos() - Arc cosine
  • sin() - Sine
  • tan() - Tangent
  • deg2rad() - Converts the number in degrees to the radian equivalent
